sic.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used after a word that you have copied in order to show that you know it was not spelled or used correctly
sic.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: We had seen several signs that said ‘ORANGE’S (sic) FOR SALE'.
sic.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to tell a dog to attack someone
sic.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: He sicced his dog on me.
sic.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to tell someone in authority that someone has done something wrong, so that they are punished
sic.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: He sicced his lawyers on them.
sic.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: written abbreviation for STANDARD INDUSTRIAL CLASSIFICATION
